thread.title: Great value for money
thread.title_full: Great value for money - Review of Premier Inn London Hackney Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Jayne H
title: Great value for money
text:
I have stayed at this Premier Inn 4 times in six months. The staff are excellent, nothing is too much trouble, they are friendly, polite and remember small things about you if you are a 'regular'. The food is good and rooms immaculate. Excellent value for money.
Room Tip: Have stayed in four different rooms, all quiet, all good. See more room tips
